name: Hellscape - 30 Day Project
description:
HOW DO I DO ANYTHING?
Up on the d-pad opens the phone

B will close the phone

D-pad navigates the phone menus

A button is the A button is the A button

The HitcHiker app is the rideshare app you are a driver for. All you can do is toggle being online for rides.

The ExpressWay app is your store. All items bought there are delivered to the ExpressWay locker on the map, located at the gas station.

Press RB to tab to the next page on apps with multiple pages(might need to re-open app)

Hold LB to access your inventory.

LT will check whatever item you have equipped, or aim if it is a gun.

RT will use the item, or shoot if it is a gun.
Press Y to get in/out of any vehicle. Stolen cars cannot be repaired at the repair shop.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
30 days ago I had a small project in Construct 3 which consisted of nothing more than a guy, a car, and a gun. A friend of mine challenged me to spend 30 days turning that nothing project into a "minimum viable product" and this is the result.

THE CONCEPT
You are a rideshare driver in the fictional city of Los Rico. Earn money delivering people from point A to B. Don't kill anyone along the way, or you might not make much!Xbox controller highly recommended.THERE ARE NO KEYBOARD CONTROLS FOR MOST OF THIS PROJECT
